results.description: What's your job? Tata Steel annually produces millions of tons of steel which are sold to customers as coils. These coils are the result of rolling slabs of steel with a thickness of over 20 cm to thinner gauges in hot- and cold rolling. In these rolling processes, the thickness is reduced by passing the material between roll pairs.
